website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular jackets by the brand. Provides just the right amount of warmth and comfort to wear in chilly to mildly cold temperatures.
pros: Lightweight yet warm, as it features a wind-resistant softshell and soft fleece lining
Has a stylish look and comes in several colors
cons: Doesn't provide enough warmth in extremely cold temperatures
Some colors and sizes may be limited

customer_reviews.title: The medium fits perfect with a shirt but not sure if I would ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium. I am usually a small but decided to go up a size to wear hoodies. I should have went with a large. The medium fits perfect with a shirt but not sure if I would wear a hoodie with this. I don't think I would need to seeing as though this is extremely warm. So glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: cathy holler

customer_reviews.title: Good product but careful with the size
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but fitted too large. I am usually S in US shirts sizes but was afraid to have it fit too tight. There was a fee to exchange this for an S size but thought it was worth it as the material dues keep out rain and wind. I recommend this product but, if possible, recommend going to a store and try the sizes first or, if undecided between two sizes, go for the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: aaas24

customer_reviews.title: seller sent me a used jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is what I wanted, however, it had been worn. There was not a ticket on it and in a pocket was a receipt for a purchased item in Texas from kung fu tea made on 12/14/2018 at 15:13. I thought I was purchasing a brand new piece of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this jacket after I lost my first one on a camping trip. I absolutely love this jacket. I live in Denver and this jacket works for basically every type of weather. Its sporty enough to wear to the gym or hiking and also cute enough to wear to work and look professional.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Arms are just a tad too long
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the jacket is perfect! The only issue I had was the arm length. Im 5”2 140LB with an arm width of about 60in, so the medium fit my torso and I was able to wear a couple of layer underneath, but the length of the arms were 3 inches too long. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby G

customer_reviews.title: Windblocker
customer_reviews.text: I wear this on my commutes to school and work in Arizona where the weather doesn't typically get too cold if you're walking, but when you bike-- yikes. This cuts the wind and doesn't have so much insulation that I find myself sweating from the exercise. I still prefer a real jacket for walking around because I need the insulation if I'm not doing as much.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Good besides logo being a type of rubber
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I do not like about this jacket is the logo is not sown in. It's a type of rubber that will eventually come off
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she loves it! It is her favorite jacket and so warm. the sleeves are lined which is her favorite part.If you are looking for a jacket for spring and fall this is it!
customer_reviews.author: WeatherMan

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My very first North Face and it luxurious compared to my old fall jacket! I’m 5’4” 120 lbs and went with a medium so I can wear hoodies and whatnot underneath. The arms are a tad long, but I like it that way!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rumsey

customer_reviews.title: NorthFace Women’s Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket for cool weather down to 45 degrees F. Waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jager

customer_reviews.title: jacket
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for granddaughter and she loved it fits great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jacket fits well. It is very stiff and has ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket fits well. It is very stiff and has not really softened up since I've been wearing it for a couple of months. The sleeves are too long.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift for my daughter and she loves it. The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable in 10 degree weather
customer_reviews.text: Wore it skiing under a North Face Fleece and under a North Face Vest. Very warm and comfortable in 10 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: NF Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Fits perfect. Arrived on time & the sale price plus my amazon credit. One heck of a deal! Happy Customer 😀
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: True to size-Great quality
customer_reviews.text: True to size fit! So happy with the product and quality for the price. I was expecting to pay twice what I did for this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Lindt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits perfect and kept me very warm on those cold winter days.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite jackets. Waterproof and super warm. Stylish and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket for Brisk weather
customer_reviews.text: Great quality Jacket! True to size and warm but not too heavy!
customer_reviews.author: brooke baskin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves it! I got it for her birthday and she wears it every day. Super comfortable and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Can wear it to nice events and casual
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my girlfriend. She loves it. Can wear it to nice events and casual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST JACKET I HAVE EVER OWNED. WORKS DURING ALL SEASONS!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The TNF Jacket Is Real!
customer_reviews.text: I love the new TNF jacket; fits well & keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Toledo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a dream. Love this jacket. Defiantly plan on getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Elantra

customer_reviews.title: she loves it fits right to size perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: For my daughters Birthday ... she loves it fits right to size perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: George Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend who loves it. The material is very waterproof and has proven itself to be very handy several times.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

product_meta.title: The North Face Women’s Apex Bionic 2 DWR Softshell Jacket
feature_bullets: Please note, the logo and hardware color may vary in styles marked as Prior Season.
Upgrade your kit with the superhuman windchill protection of the Apex Bionic Jacket.

WindWall™ softshell:• Shell offers windproof protection that maintains breathability to avoid overheating.• DWR (durable water repellent) finish offers additional water-resistant protection.• Stretch softshell improves range of motion.• 351 g/m² fabric weight. Stretch mesh lining through the body improves breathability. Smooth-faced lining at the sleeves glides over base layers. Stand collar with brushed inner face. Full-length zip with inner draft flap. Long s
